summary: Personal website with sections for resume, blogs, memories, articles, and kids' study material.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Soft botanical hero background illustration with leaves, warm golden light rays, and gentle nature textures in earthy beige, forest green, and soft terracotta tones (hero-background.dim_1440x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a warm, personal, and elegant visual theme for the entire website â€” using earthy, cozy tones (e.g., warm beige, deep forest green, soft terracotta) with clean serif/sans-serif typography and a layout that feels like a personal journal or digital home. Apply this theme consistently across all pages and sections.

Build a homepage with a hero section introducing the owner, a navigation bar linking to all major sections (Resume, Blogs, Memories, Articles, Kids' Study Material), and a brief summary of what the site offers.

Implement a Resume section that displays structured professional information including a summary/about section, work experience timeline, education, and skills. Store and serve resume data from the backend.

Implement a Blog section where the owner can create, store, and display blog posts. Each post should have a title, content body, publication date, and optional tags. The blog listing page shows all posts as cards; clicking a card opens the full post.

Implement a Memories section for storing and displaying personal photo memories. Each memory entry has a title, description, and an image URL. Display memories in a masonry-style or grid gallery layout.

Implement an Articles section for publishing long-form articles. Each article has a title, rich text content, publication date, and an optional cover image URL. The listing page shows article cards; clicking opens the full article.

Implement a Kids' Study Material section for hosting educational content created for children. Each item has a title, subject/category, description, and a content body or downloadable link. Items are displayed in a friendly, colorful grid organized by subject.

Add a simple admin mode (toggle or password-protected panel) that reveals 'Add New' forms for each section (Blog, Memories, Articles, Study Material, Resume). This allows the owner to manage content directly from the site without a separate CMS.

Generate a warm, illustrative hero background image for the homepage featuring soft botanical/nature elements (leaves, soft light) in earthy tones to reinforce the personal and welcoming feel of the site.

new_feature_requests.summary: Resume section to showcase professional experience and skills
Blog section for writing and publishing blog posts
Memories section for personal photos and moments
Articles section for publishing long-form articles
Kids' study material section for hosting educational content created for children
